ContractItemPriceHistory.name: ContractItemPriceHistory
ContractItemPriceHistory.description: Represents the history of changes to the values in the fields of a ContractItemPrice object.

DataType.description: Data type of the field that was changed.

Field.description: Name of the field that was changed.

NewValue.description: New value of the field that was changed.

OldValue.description: Latest value of the field before it was changed.

ContractItemPriceHistory.accessRules: This object is available in Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions of Revenue Cloud.
